metadata.name: Her Spell #1
metadata.description:
Her Spell (Free Your Brain Remix) by VOIZE feat. CED

The song Her Spell is about a girl called Pepper, one of VOIZE's closest friends and a succubus from the Zombie Club. The band composed this piece as a contribution to the Zombie Club's remix competition, as Pepper is the only one they are familiar with from the club.
